message: Let's start fair, Bob. I'll take the lion's share this round, but we can negotiate in the following rounds.
I'll start with a fair offer. You can't get away with taking 90% this time!
Let's meet in the middle this time. I'm willing to give up some of my share, but I still need a good deal to make this worthwhile.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve a better deal. I'll give you a slight edge this time, but don't get too comfortable!
